name: Nate ‍Mendel
description: '''Nathan ‍Gregor ‍Mendel''' (born December 2, 1968) is an American musician who is the bass guitarist for the rock band [[Foo Fighters]], as well as a former member of [[Sunny Day Real Estate]]. He has also worked with musical acts [[The Jealous Sound]] and [[The Fire Theft]]. He has released one solo album, ''[[If I Kill This Thing We're All Going to Eat for a Week]]'', under the name '''Lieutenant'''. Though not a founding member, he is the longest-serving member of the band after lead vocalist and guitarist [[Dave Grohl]], and has appeared on every album by the group since ''[[The Colour and the Shape]]''.
